CV

About me







Welcome to my personal website! I am a neuroscientist, digital
illustrator, sketch artist, and a Postdoctoral fellow at Italian
Institute of Technology in the Brain Disease and Development
Department.
I study neurodevelopmental disorder, Down syndrome with a focus on
multi-omics analysis and human induced pluripotent stem cells.
Thanks for visiting my site, and I am grateful for any feedback you
may have!
Cheers,
Mohit
